title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Software Development and DevOps with Agentic AI (AIM293)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 用智能体AI重新构想软件开发和DevOps (AIM293)
abstract: We are infusing Agentic AI into the entire Software Development Lifecycle from brainstorming new ideas, implementing a plan, crafting new code, reviewing code reviews, releasing software, and bringing insights back to the development team. See how GitHub Copilot is being reimagined through this entire lifecycle to boost productivity across teams. This presentation is brought to you by GitHub, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 我们正在将智能体AI融入整个软件开发生命周期，从头脑风暴新想法、实施计划、编写新代码、审查代码评审、发布软件，到为开发团队带回洞察。了解GitHub Copilot如何在整个生命周期中被重新构想，以提升团队的生产力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴GitHub提供。
